text: [Chapter 13a] [Bipole Sea, Bipole Sea]

speaker: left
text: I think I see someone.
(A small boat passes by Proton's ship)
???: Are you going to Altar?
???: If so, I don't recommend going there.

speaker: left
text: No, we are going to Nolavillia.
???: Nolavillia?
???: I suppose I could live there...
???: I used to live at Altar, but my town was destroyed by the Holy Itucher.
???: Would you mind if I joined you guys on your journey to Nolavillia?
[Recruit ???] (Q) Recruit (W) Do not recruit

speaker: left
text: You can come along if you'd like.

speaker: left
text: We're also on our way to stop the Holy Itucher from evil.
???: You're going to stop the Holy Itucher? It must be stopped, allow me to help you stop it.
[Relaeh has joined your party]
???: Oh yeah, did I tell you I was being chased by pirates?

speaker: left
text: What!?
???: HAR! HAR! HAR! HAR! HARRRRR!!!
???: I AM THE GREAT KAPTAIN K'NEVILLE!!!
K'Neville: THE GREATEST WARRIOR IN THE REALM!!!
K'Neville: THE MASTER OF THE ECONOMY!!!
K'Neville: THE KING OF THE UNKNOWN AMOUNT OF SEAS!!!
K'Neville: FEAR ME!!!
K'Neville: ...AND MY UNTHREATENING CREW!!!
???: What poppin' gang.
K'Neville: HAR! HAR! HAR! HAR! HARRRRR!!!
K'Neville: LEEEEEEETS LOOT 'EM!!!!!!
???: Where we droppin' bois?
???: SKREEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!!!!!!!!!

speaker: left
text: Everyone! Prepare for battle!
